title: Inception (42 Network)
description: Inception 42 is a system administration exercise focused on creating a small infrastructure using Docker. This project aims to deepen understanding of system administration concepts through practical application.

title: Webserv (42 Network)
description: A custom HTTP server implementation in C++98. This project aims to deepen our understanding of how web servers and the HTTP protocol work by building a server from scratch.

title: minishell (Custom Shell)
description: A simple shell implementation project, aiming to recreate basic functionalities of bash. This project focuses on process creation, file descriptors, and command interpretation.
